This service requires Internet access. By touching AGREE, you grant this permission and agree to the %1$s and %2$s.

This service needs to connect to the Internet and access device, app, and network information, as well as other data you submit. If you are a minor, you must obtain your parent/guardian\'s consent to use this service. By touching AGREE, you indicate that you grant the above permissions and accept the terms of the %1$s and %2$s.

This service requires access to storage and microphone permissions to obtain device, application, and network information, and to read images and audio and video information for video editing. By clicking Agree, you agree to the above content and %1$s and %2$s.
Statement About Petal Clip and Privacy
This service requires an Internet connection and needs to access device, app, and network information, as well as data you actively upload.
If you are a minor, you must obtain your parent/guardian\'s consent to use this service.
By touching AGREE, you agree to these terms as well as the %1$s and %2$s.
Statement About Petal Clip and Privacy
The following categories of information will be collected and used to provide this service:
Such as device identifier (UUID), model, and type
Such as requested URLs and request type
Such as app launch time and performance data
Such as screen resolution and language settings
Such as app name, package name, and version number
The data controller is Aspiegel SE, a subsidiary of Huawei in Ireland. Your data will also be used for the purpose of service improvement.
For more information on how we process your data and about your rights, including the right to object, touch %s.
This service requires the following permissions:
To allow us to save audio and video files
To allow you to access online resources
To allow you to use recordings as audio resources
For us to obtain device information
If you are a minor, you must obtain your parent/guardian\'s consent to use this service.
By touching AGREE, you indicate that you grant the above permissions and accept the terms of the %1$s.
Share device and app usage data
Your data will be used to help improve this service.
Save video to Petal Clip album?
Automatically create a video with AI.
Use two fingers to zoom or rotate.
Drag from ends to change clip length.
Don\'t lock the device or switch apps during the export.
Videos take up about %s less space, but may not play on other devices.

Videos are exported to H.264 format in Compatibility mode, and H.265 format in Compression mode.\nA H.265 format video is about half the size of the same video in H.264 format, while maintaining a similar level of quality. This means that H.265 videos require less bandwidth to stream or download, without compromising video quality.
Are you sure you want to stop the export?
